162462.「フフ……。\n その姿 とてもよく お似合いですよ。\n<br>\n「ですが:
Hmm... You look great... However, if you wish to remove your disguise and return to your original form, please come back here... You
can return to your original form as many times as you like as long as your disguise makeover lasts, or you can return to your
disguise makeover form...

162463.「……そうですか。\n それは 本当に 残念なことです。 \n 気が変わりまし:
... Well... That's really unfortunate... If
you change your mind, please come back...

162465.「では 説明しましょう。こちらでは\n 仮装メイク道具という 特別な品と交換で\:
Let me explain... Here, in exchange for a special item called a masquerade makeup kit, you can use my masquerade makeup art... The
Art of Disguise is a dreamy make-up trick that will change your appearance from one race to another for a short time. You can be
a friendly dwarf, a cool werewolf... A nice bodied, macho Ogre can become a petite, cute Pukulipo! Of course, it's only temporary.
Your true nature is still <%sM_real_race>. But you'll be able to enjoy the change in your appearance to the fullest! As long as
the disguise and makeup technique is active, you can return to your original form as many times as you like... or even take on the
disguise and makeup form again. However, if you wish to choose a different race for your disguise makeup, you'll need to get new
disguise makeup tools... In that case, the duration of your disguise makeup will be extended by adding to your remaining time...
You can also change your hairstyle and appearance in disguise... And the next time you make up in disguise, if you're the same
species as last time, the changes you made at the beauty parlor will remain intact. ... That's all... I hope you understand...

162466.「フフ……。\n 仮装メイクの延長を ご希望ですか。 \n そのお姿が お気に召:
Huh... She asked for an extension on her masquerade makeup. I'm sure she likes the way you look... But in order to do that, we'll
need to give you new disguise makeup... In that case, the fancy dress makeup will be valid for the remainder of the current
period, plus the period of the new fancy dress makeup. So, which disguise will you be using?

162467.「フフ……。\n 仮装メイクの延長を ご希望ですか。 \n そのお姿が お気に召:
Huh... She asked for an extension on her masquerade makeup. I'm sure she likes the way you look... But in order to do that, we'll
need to get you some new make-up for your masquerade... Oh... Unfortunately, you don't seem to have any fancy dress make-up right
now... Please get your make-up and come back... We'll be waiting...

162468.「フフ……。では いきますよ。\n<br>\n「私の 仮装メイク術の冴え……:
Huh... And now... My fancy dress makeup
skills... Take a look!<end>

162469.「仮装メイクを落として\n 元の種族の姿に 戻られるのですね。\n<br>\n「:
You're going to take off your make-up, and you're going to go back to your tribal form... I understand... Then I will return
you to your tribal form...

162470.「メイクの有効期間内であれば 選んだ種族の姿に\n 何度でも 仮装メイクすること:
As long as your make-up is valid, you can
wear your make-up as many times as you
like... Feel free to...

162471.<pc>の姿が 元の種族の姿に戻った！: <pc> has reverted to his original form!

162472.「フフ…… そうこなくては。 \n それでは まず ご使用になりたい\n 仮装:
Huh... Oh, no... Now, first, we'll have you
choose the fancy dress makeup tools you'd
like to use...

162473.「あなたに ほどこした\n 仮装メイクの 効果時間は\n まだ 残っているようで:
It seems that the masquerade makeup I applied
to you still has time to take effect... I'll
go back to my <%sL_KASOU_RACE> form...<bw_break>

162474.「……おや？\n あなたは 仮装メイク道具を\n お持ちではないようですね。\n:
... Hmm? You don't seem to have any fancy dress makeup... I'm sorry, but to do a masquerade, you'll need to bring a special
item called a masquerade makeup kit... Please get your fancy dress makeup supplies and come here... We'll be waiting...

162475.「フフ……\n 今とは 別の種族の姿に\n 仮装メイクしたいのですね。\n<br:
Huh... I'd like to be made up as a different species... But in order to do that, you'll need to give me a new set of disguise and
makeup tools. In that case, the duration of your disguise will be the remainder of your current period plus the duration of your new
disguise. So, which disguise will you be using?

162476.「フフ……。\n 今とは 別の種族の姿に\n 仮装メイクしたいのですね。\n<b:
Huh... I'd like to be made up as a different species... But in order to do that, you'll need to give me a new set of make-up... Oh...
Unfortunately, you don't seem to have any of these right now... Please get your make-up and come back... We'll be waiting...

162477.「では どの種族の姿への 仮装メイクを\n お望みですか？ \n<break>:
So, what species would you like to be made up
as?<break>

162480.「フフ…… はじめまして。\n 私は メイク術師マギダスと申します。\n<br>:
Huh... Introduction... My name is Maggidus the Make-up Artist... I may look like this, but... I can perform a rather interesting
trick... It's called the art of disguise makeup... I'd like to share this technique with as many people as possible, so I've
borrowed this place...

162481.「フフ…… お久しぶりですね。\n 私ですよ。メイク術師のマギダスです。\n<b:
Huh... Long time no see... I'm... Magida, the make-up artist... It's so good to see you again... It seems you and I are connected by
the thread of fate... In fact... I'd like more people to know about my make-up techniques, so I've decided to rent this
place...

162482.「仮装メイク術は あなたの種族としての見た目を\n すこしの時間だけ 別の種族に:
The art of disguise make-up is a dream that allows you to change the appearance of your race for a short time... You can be a
friendly dwarf, a cool werewolf... A nice bodied, macho ogre can become a petite, cute Pukulipo! It's only a temporary disguise, but
you'll have a lot of fun changing your appearance! You can return to your original form as many times as you like within the
validity period of the disguise and makeup jutsu, or you can return to your disguise and makeup form again... However, in order to
perform this trick, you'll need to give us a special item called a masquerade makeup kit, so... What do you think? Why don't you become
something different?

162483.「フフ…… いらっしゃいませ。\n メイク術師マギダスです。\n<bw_brea:
Hehe... welcome. I am Magidas, the
cosmetologist.
<bw_break>

162484.「フフ…… いらっしゃいませ。\n メイク術師マギダスです。\n その姿 とても:
Huh... Welcome... Maggida, the make-up
artist... You look so good...<bw_break>

162485.「さて 本日は この私に\n どのような ご用件でしょうか？\n<break>: So, what can I do for you today, sir?<break>

162492.<select_se_off>\n仮装メイク術を落とす\n別の種族の姿になる\n:
<select_se_off>
Remove Disguise
Change Race
Extend Period
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

162493.<select_se_off>\nメイク直し術をする\n別の種族の姿になる\n有:
<select_se_off>
Apply Disguise
Change Race
Extend Period
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

162494.髪型などの見た目は 美容院で変えられます。\n美容院でおこなった変更は 今後 同:
You can change your hairstyle at the hairdresser... Any changes you make at the salon will remain with you even if you choose
to masquerade as the same species in the future. If the disguise makeover expires, you'll automatically revert to your original
race.

162496.<pc>は <%sL_KASOU_RACE>の姿に\n仮装メイクしてもらった！\:
<pc> is now disguised as a(n)
<%sL_KASOU_RACE>! The effect will
last <%dL_DAY> day(s), <%dL_HOUR> hour(s), and <%dL_MIN> minute(s).

162497.仮装メイク道具の 入手方法は\n『説明を聞く』で 確認することができます。:
You can find out how to get your make-up by
going to "Ask for instructions".

162498.「有効期間が 最大の９０日を超えてしまうため\n ９０日止まりと なってしまいま:
It's not valid for more than 90 days. It's
only valid for 90 days. Is that OK with you?<yesno 2><break>

162499.「<%sL_KASOU_RACE>の姿への 仮装メイク術の有効期間は\n <%n:
The period of validity of the masquerade make-up art of <%sL_KASOU_RACE> has been extended to <%nL_DAY> days <%nL_HOUR> hours
<%nL_MIN>... Are you sure you want to do this?

162500.「おや……。あなたは すでに\n その種族の姿に 仮装メイク中ですよ。\n<br:
Oh... You're already dressed and made up as
one of them. So... So you'd like to extend
your masquerade?<yesno 2><break>

162501.「ほう……。\n <%sL_KASOU_RACE>を選びましたか。 \n<br>:
Ho... I've chosen <%sL_KASOU_RACE>... I can't re-select another race for the duration of the effect, but may I masquerade as
<%sL_KASOU_RACE>?

166140.「おっと……。\n 残念ですが 仮装メイク術の有効期間を\n 過ぎてしまったよう:
Oops... I'm sorry, but we've passed the
expiration date for the masquerade makeup
technique...

166867.「<%sL_KASOU_RACE>の姿への 仮装メイク術の有効期間は\n <%n:
The period of validity of the masquerade make-up art of <%sL_KASOU_RACE> has been extended to <%nL_DAY> days <%nL_HOUR> hours
<%nL_MIN>... Are you sure you want to do this?

167019.<color_yellow>\n仮装メイク術の 有効期間は \nゲームをプレイ:
<color_yellow>The duration of the masquerade will also
decrease when you're not playing the game.
Please note...<color_white>

167020.「では どの仮装メイク道具を\n お使いになりますか？\n<break>:
So which fancy dress make-up kit will you be
using?<break>

167026.仮装メイク術の 有効期間は \nゲームをプレイしていない時間も 減少します。\:
The duration of the masquerade will also decrease when you're not playing the game. Please note... The maximum time you can use
it is 90 days... Disguise Makeup can be found in the DQX Shop... Dragon Quest X Shop: The Awakened Adventurer's Square
https://sqex.to/makeup
